lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
Your mother has recommended a new hairstylist that she says will make you look great.
His name is Mr. Gene. He mentions that the person who cut your hair last was a barbarian.
He tells you that he is about to give you an entirely new look.
While he is cutting, he mentions that it's a shame that none of the young girls appreciate the hairstyles of the 40's.
SNIP! SNIP! "Don't look up," he says.
"Please, try not to look up. You are disturbing my concentration."
He starts to blow-dry your hair. For a second you catch a glimpse of the floor which seems to contain a HUGE amount of your (former) hair.
When you are finished, you look at yourself in the mirror. You look sensational. All of your friends love it. Five guys ask you for dates. Happiness, Calmness and Social characteristics all rise.
